arts.ttl: Flick talks Lamine, Pedri, Olmo, Lewandowski, Joan Garcia, Cubarsi ahead of Barcelona vs Elche
arts.sum: Following their 2-1 defeat to Real Madrid, FC Barcelona will be itching to bounce back strongly when they take on Elche tomorrow at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys. Already five points behind Xabi Alonsoâ€™s men, the Blaugrana could find themselves trailing by eight, given that the current league leaders play relegation-battling Valencia later tonight.
